sentences.english: "The world expects great things from Turkey, " he wrote in an essay for Foreign Policy .
sentences.chinese: 全世界都在期待土耳其最終成就豐功偉業。

sentences.english: Now the political world has begun to focus on the immensity of her achievement.
sentences.chinese: 現在世界政壇開始聚焦她的豐功偉績。

sentences.english: I longed to wander over the scenes of renowned achievement .
sentences.chinese: 我渴望着漫遊豐功偉績的聖地。

sentences.english: The great love and great achievements involve great risk.
sentences.chinese: 所有濃烈的愛情和豐功偉業一樣蘊含著巨大的風險。

sentences.english: Take into account that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
sentences.chinese: 要考慮到，濃情烈愛與豐功偉業都包含着極大的風險。

sentences.english: The player can read through their progress and remember the feats and choices of their past.
sentences.chinese: 玩家可以查閱它來了解回憶自己過去的那些豐功偉績。

definition: Baopuzi, collection of essays by Ge Hong 葛洪[Ge3 Hong2] on alchemy, immortality, legalism, society etc
Zanhuang county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei
On learning, classic book by Confucian philosopher Xun Zi 荀子 (c. 310-237 BC)
to die of old age/to live to a ripe old age/(fig.) (of sth) to come to an end (after a long period of service)
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
